summary: This is a certified timesheet summary for an employee at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, covering the pay period from July 28 to August 10, 2019. It shows regular work hours, leave usage, and includes supervisor approval signatures. The document is significant as it is administrative paperwork from the federal prison where Jeffrey Epstein was held at the time of his death.

persons.name: Toni Ord
persons.context: Appears as the employee whose timesheet is being certified, working at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: Lamine N'Diaye
persons.context: Appears as the supervisor who approved the timesheet request on August 7, 2019.

connections.description: N'Diaye approved Ord's timesheet, indicating a supervisory relationship within the prison staff.

events.title: Timesheet Approval
events.description: Supervisor Lamine N'Diaye approved the timesheet request for employee Toni Ord.

events.title: Timesheet Affirmation
events.description: The employee affirmed the timesheet, certifying all reported time was worked according to regulations.

keyFacts: This is an administrative timesheet for a staff member at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The timesheet covers the pay period from July 28 to August 10, 2019, which includes the time around Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
The document shows standard prison administrative procedures with supervisor approvals and employee certifications.
The document originated from the Federal Bureau of Prisons system, specifically the MCC where Epstein was incarcerated.
